prisma.test.testutils.testcase module¶

class prisma.test.testutils.testcase.PrismaTestCase(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: twisted.trial._asynctest.TestCase

This class is made to speedup things when testing. Basically already implements a setUp and tearDown functions.
